Name: Don't Look Up
Star: Leonardo DiCaprio, Jennifer Lawrence, Meryl Streep, Cate Blanchett
Summary: Two low-level astronomers must go on a giant media tour to warn mankind of an approaching comet that will destroy planet Earth.

Name: Encanto
Director: Jared Bush, Byron Howard, Charise Castro Smith
Star: Stephanie Beatriz, María Cecilia Botero, John Leguizamo, Mauro Castillo
Summary: A young Colombian girl has to face the frustration of being the only member of her family without magical powers.

Name: Christmas Vacation
Star: Chevy Chase, Beverly D'Angelo, Juliette Lewis, Johnny Galecki
Summary: The Griswold family's plans for a big family Christmas predictably turn into a big disaster.

Name: Love Actually
Star: Hugh Grant, Martine McCutcheon, Liam Neeson, Laura Linney
Summary: Follows the lives of eight very different couples in dealing with their love lives in various loosely interrelated tales all set during a frantic month before Christmas in London, England.

Name: Home Alone
Star: Macaulay Culkin, Joe Pesci, Daniel Stern, John Heard
Summary: An eight-year-old troublemaker must protect his house from a pair of burglars when he is accidentally left home alone by his family during Christmas vacation.

Name: The Lost City
Star: Sandra Bullock, Brad Pitt, Daniel Radcliffe, Channing Tatum
Summary: A reclusive romance novelist on a book tour with her cover model gets swept up in a kidnapping attempt that lands them both in a cutthroat jungle adventure.

Name: Emily in Paris
Star: Lily Collins, Philippine Leroy-Beaulieu, Ashley Park, Lucas Bravo
Summary: A young American woman from the Midwest is hired by a marketing firm in Paris to provide them with an American perspective on things.

Name: Licorice Pizza
Star: Alana Haim, Cooper Hoffman, Sean Penn, Tom Waits
Summary: The story of Alana Kane and Gary Valentine growing up, running around and going through the treacherous navigation of first love in the San Fernando Valley, 1973.

Name: The King's Man
Star: Ralph Fiennes, Gemma Arterton, Rhys Ifans, Harris Dickinson
Summary: In the early years of the 20th century, the Kingsman agency is formed to stand against a cabal plotting a war to wipe out millions.

Name: How the Grinch Stole Christmas
Star: Jim Carrey, Taylor Momsen, Kelley, Jeffrey Tambor
Summary: On the outskirts of Whoville lives a green, revenge-seeking Grinch who plans to ruin Christmas for all of the citizens of the town.

Name: Elf
Star: Will Ferrell, James Caan, Bob Newhart, Zooey Deschanel
Summary: Raised as an over-sized elf, a human travels from the North Pole to NYC to meet his biological father who doesn't know he exists and is in desperate need of some Christmas spirit.

Name: White Christmas
Star: Bing Crosby, Danny Kaye, Rosemary Clooney, Vera-Ellen
Summary: A successful song-and-dance team become romantically involved with a sister act and team up to save the failing Vermont inn of their former commanding general.

Name: Sing 2
Star: Matthew McConaughey, Reese Witherspoon, Scarlett Johansson, Tori Kelly
Summary: Buster Moon and his friends must persuade reclusive rock star Clay Calloway to join them for the opening of a new show.

Name: And Just Like That...
Star: Sarah Jessica Parker, Cynthia Nixon, Kristin Davis, Sara Ramirez
Summary: The series will follow Carrie, Miranda and Charlotte as they navigate the journey from the complicated reality of life and friendship in their 30s to the even more complicated reality of life and friendship in their 50s.

Name: A Christmas Story
Star: Peter Billingsley, Melinda Dillon, Darren McGavin, Scott Schwartz
Summary: In the 1940s, a young boy named Ralphie attempts to convince his parents, his teacher and Santa that a Red Ryder BB gun really is the perfect Christmas gift.

Name: The French Dispatch
Star: Benicio Del Toro, Adrien Brody, Tilda Swinton, Léa Seydoux
Summary: A love letter to journalists set in an outpost of an American newspaper in a fictional twentieth century French city that brings to life a collection of stories published in "The French Dispatch Magazine".

Name: It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia
Star: Charlie Day, Glenn Howerton, Rob McElhenney, Kaitlin Olson
Summary: Five friends with big egos and small brains are the proprietors of an Irish pub in Philadelphia.

Name: The Santa Clause
Star: Tim Allen, Judge Reinhold, Wendy Crewson, Eric Lloyd
Summary: When a man inadvertently makes Santa fall off of his roof on Christmas Eve, he finds himself magically recruited to take his place.

Name: Ted Lasso
Star: Jason Sudeikis, Brett Goldstein, Brendan Hunt, Nick Mohammed
Summary: American college football coach Ted Lasso heads to London to manage AFC Richmond, a struggling English Premier League soccer team.

Name: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
Star: Macaulay Culkin, Joe Pesci, Daniel Stern, Catherine O'Hara
Summary: One year after Kevin McCallister was left home alone and had to defeat a pair of bumbling burglars, he accidentally finds himself stranded in New York City - and the same criminals are not far behind.

Name: The Grinch
Star: Benedict Cumberbatch, Cameron Seely, Rashida Jones, Pharrell Williams
Summary: A grumpy Grinch (Benedict Cumberbatch) plots to ruin Christmas for the village of Whoville.

Name: Scrooged
Star: Bill Murray, Karen Allen, John Forsythe, John Glover
Summary: A selfish, cynical television executive is haunted by three spirits bearing lessons on Christmas Eve.

Name: The Office
Star: Steve Carell, Jenna Fischer, John Krasinski, Rainn Wilson
Summary: A mockumentary on a group of typical office workers, where the workday consists of ego clashes, inappropriate behavior, and tedium.

Name: The Polar Express
Star: Tom Hanks, Chris Coppola, Michael Jeter, Leslie Zemeckis
Summary: On Christmas Eve, a young boy embarks on a magical adventure to the North Pole on the Polar Express, while learning about friendship, bravery, and the spirit of Christmas.

Name: Seinfeld
Star: Jerry Seinfeld, Julia Louis-Dreyfus, Michael Richards, Jason Alexander
Summary: The continuing misadventures of neurotic New York City stand-up comedian Jerry Seinfeld and his equally neurotic New York City friends.

Name: Ron's Gone Wrong
Director: Sarah Smith, Jean-Philippe Vine, Octavio E. Rodriguez
Star: Jack Dylan Grazer, Zach Galifianakis, Ed Helms, Olivia Colman
Summary: The story of Barney, an awkward middle-schooler and Ron, his new walking, talking, digitally-connected device. Ron's malfunctions set against the backdrop of the social media age launch them on a journey to learn about true friendship.

Name: Curb Your Enthusiasm
Star: Larry David, Cheryl Hines, Jeff Garlin, Susie Essman
Summary: The life and times of Larry David and the predicaments he gets himself into with his friends and complete strangers.

Name: Klaus
Star: Jason Schwartzman, J.K. Simmons, Rashida Jones, Will Sasso
Summary: A simple act of kindness always sparks another, even in a frozen, faraway place. When Smeerensburg's new postman, Jesper, befriends toymaker Klaus, their gifts melt an age-old feud and deliver a sleigh full of holiday traditions.

Name: The Holiday
Star: Kate Winslet, Cameron Diaz, Jude Law, Jack Black
Summary: Two women troubled with guy-problems swap homes in each other's countries, where they each meet a local guy and fall in love.

Name: Last Train to Christmas
Star: Michael Sheen, Cary Elwes, Nathalie Emmanuel, Katherine Kelly
Summary: Tony Towers is a local celebrity, a successful nightclub manager and he is engaged to a younger woman, Sue. Things get a little strange when he embarks upon the 3:17 to Nottingham for a Christmas family reunion.

Name: Last Christmas
Star: Madison Ingoldsby, Emma Thompson, Boris Isakovic, Lucy Miller
Summary: Kate is a young woman subscribed to bad decisions. Working as an elf in a year round Christmas store is not good for the wannabe singer. However, she meets Tom there. Her life takes a new turn. For Kate, it seems too good to be true.

Name: Landscapers
Star: Olivia Colman, David Thewlis, Kate O'Flynn, Dipo Ola
Summary: A devoted and mild-mannered British couple become the focus of an extraordinary investigation when two dead bodies are discovered in the back garden of a house in England.

Name: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
Director: Bob Persichetti, Peter Ramsey, Rodney Rothman
Star: Shameik Moore, Jake Johnson, Hailee Steinfeld, Mahershala Ali
Summary: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe, and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

Name: Red Notice
Star: Dwayne Johnson, Ryan Reynolds, Gal Gadot, Ritu Arya
Summary: An Interpol agent tracks the world's most wanted art thief.

Name: The Sex Lives of College Girls
Star: Pauline Chalamet, Amrit Kaur, Reneé Rapp, Alyah Chanelle Scott
Summary: Four 18-year-old freshman roommates at Essex College in Vermont. A bundle of contradictions and hormones, these sexually active college girls are equal parts lovable and infuriating.

Name: Sing
Star: Matthew McConaughey, Reese Witherspoon, Seth MacFarlane, Scarlett Johansson
Summary: In a city of humanoid animals, a hustling theater impresario's attempt to save his theater with a singing competition becomes grander than he anticipates even as its finalists find that their lives will never be the same.

Name: Friends
Star: Jennifer Aniston, Courteney Cox, Lisa Kudrow, Matt LeBlanc
Summary: Follows the personal and professional lives of six twenty to thirty-something-year-old friends living in Manhattan.

Name: Single All the Way
Star: Michael Urie, Philemon Chambers, Luke Macfarlane, Barry Bostwick
Summary: Desperate to avoid his family's judgment about his perpetual single status, Peter convinces his best friend Nick to join him for the holidays and pretend that they're now in a relationship.

Name: The Great
Star: Elle Fanning, Nicholas Hoult, Phoebe Fox, Sacha Dhawan
Summary: A royal woman living in rural Russia during the 18th century is forced to choose between her own personal happiness and the future of Russia, when she marries an Emperor.

Name: Ghostbusters: Afterlife
Star: Carrie Coon, Paul Rudd, Finn Wolfhard, Mckenna Grace
Summary: When a single mom and her two kids arrive in a small town, they begin to discover their connection to the original Ghostbusters and the secret legacy their grandfather left behind.

Name: Love Hard
Star: Nina Dobrev, Jimmy O. Yang, Darren Barnet, James Saito
Summary: An LA girl, unlucky in love, falls for an East Coast guy on a dating app and decides to surprise him for the holidays, only to discover that she's been catfished. This lighthearted romantic comedy chronicles her attempt to reel in love.

Name: 8-Bit Christmas
Star: Winslow Fegley, Neil Patrick Harris, Steve Zahn, June Diane Raphael
Summary: In 1980s Chicago, a 10-year-old sets out on a quest to get the Christmas gift of his generation: the latest and greatest video-game system.

Name: Atrangi Re
Star: Dhanush, Sara Ali Khan, Akshay Kumar, Seema Biswas
Summary: A Tamil boy meets a girl from Bihar, what follows is a love story for the ages. A non-linear narrative of two romances running in parallel from different timelines.

Name: Jingle All the Way
Star: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Sinbad, Phil Hartman, Rita Wilson
Summary: A father vows to get his son a Turbo Man action figure for Christmas. However, every store is sold out of them, and he must travel all over town and compete with everybody else in order to find one.

Name: Sex and the City
Star: Sarah Jessica Parker, Kim Cattrall, Kristin Davis, Cynthia Nixon
Summary: Four female New Yorkers gossip about their sex lives (or lack thereof) and find new ways to deal with being a woman in the late 1990s.

Name: Free Guy
Star: Ryan Reynolds, Jodie Comer, Taika Waititi, Lil Rel Howery
Summary: A bank teller discovers that he's actually an NPC inside a brutal, open world video game.

Name: How I Met Your Father
Star: Kim Cattrall, Hilary Duff, Christopher Lowell, Francia Raisa
Summary: Sophie and her close-knit group of friends are in the midst of figuring out who they are, what they want out of life, and how to fall in love in the age of dating apps and limitless options.

Name: I Love Lucy
Star: Lucille Ball, Desi Arnaz, Vivian Vance, William Frawley
Summary: The wife of a band leader constantly tries to become a star - in spite of her having no talent, and gets herself (along with her best friend) into the funniest predicaments.

Name: The Big Bang Theory
Star: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco, Simon Helberg
Summary: A woman who moves into an apartment across the hall from two brilliant but socially awkward physicists shows them how little they know about life outside of the laboratory.

Name: Rumble
Star: Geraldine Viswanathan, Will Arnett, Stephen A. Smith, Terry Crews
Summary: In a world where monster wrestling is a global sport and monsters are superstar athletes, teenage Winnie seeks to follow in her father's footsteps by coaching a loveable underdog monster into a champion.
